item.title: Sharing Knowledge
item.description: This post is mostly the thoughts that were triggered when I saw this tweet from James Clear - Unshared knowledge is like potential energy. It’s nice to have, but it only changes things when you turn it into something else. Your legacy is what you share, not what you know. https://t.co/0mq82fQUnP — James Clear (@JamesClear) January 5, 2020 I have always had the habit of sharing everything I learn, be it a simple tweet or a complex concept.
